rukus.text: 76|23|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban banhchouh kompir kuor an aoy anak  chea damnakkal  .

76|24|dau che  neah  chaur anak( mou ham meat) atthmot champoh bt b nhnh te nei  mcheasa robsa anak  haey kom brate b tde tam anak del br pru td babakamm  ryy anak brachheang knongchamnaom puokke aoy saoh .
76|25|haey chaur anak romluk neam nei mcheasa robsa anak teang pruk teang  lngeach .
76|26|haey knongamlongpel yb  chaur anak saou chout( thvayobangkoum)  champoh trong  ning leukatamkeung trong nowpel ybchrow .

76|27|pitabrakd nasa  puok teangnoh( puok mou sh ri ki n)sraleanh  karorsanow knong lokey  haey puokke baohbng thngai del mean pheap  vukavr da khlangokla( thngai barlok) dak kraoyokhnang robsa puokke .

76|28|yeung kuchea anak del ban bangkeut puokke  ning ban pongrung reang  kay robsa puokke .  tebae yeung mean chetnea( bamphlanh puokke) yeung  ka ach phlasabdaur krom phe  sa ng tiet dauch puokke mk chomnuosa vinh ban der .
76|29|pitabrakd nasa  chompouk nih kuchea kar romluk muoy .  dau che  neah  anaknea haey brathnea chngban la noh  ke pitchea chreusareusa meakra tow  kan mcheasa robsa ke cheaminkhan .
76|30|haey puok anak min ach mean bamnng thveuavei muoy ban laey  leuklengte a l laoh mean chetnea bonnaoh .  pitabrakd nasa  a l laoh mha doeng  mha ktebandet .

76|31|daoy trong nung banhchoul tow knong kdei me tda krounea robsa trong  champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea .  haey puok del bampean trong  ban riebcham samreab puokke nouv tearounakamm da sen chhucheab .
